resources.string:
A tree fell on Saturday (10), interdicting a stretch of Avenida do Contorno, in the Floresta neighborhood, in the eastern region of Minas Gerais.

According to the Transport and Traffic Company of Belo Horizonte (BHTrans) of vehicles was interrupted at the time of crossing with Itajubá Street, towards Santa Efigênia.

The Fire Department was called to cut the tree. Around 16:35, the corporation reported that another tree is also at risk of falling on the site and should be pruned or suppressed. 

At 16h50, the traffic had been partially released on the spot, according to the military.

Gustavo da Silveira, in the Horto neighborhood, also in the Eastern Region, another tree fell at the time of the number 1,035. According to firefighters, wiring from the power grid was hit.

both instances there were no injuries.
Tree falls on Avenida do Contorno
Passage of vehicles was interrupted at the time of crossing with Itajubá Street, towards Santa Efigênia
